headline: Could New AI Expertise on Corning’s (GLW) Board Shape Its Innovation Edge?
summary: Corning Incorporated’s Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.28 per share, payable December 12, 2025, to shareholders of record on November 14, 2025, and appointed Ami Badani, Chief Marketing Officer at Arm Holdings, to its Board of Directors effective October 7, 2025. Ms. Badani’s appointment brings deep AI and semiconductor industry experience to Corning, highlighting the company’s focus on technological innovation for high-growth industries. We’ll explore how the...
